Html:
Hi,

I have updated VS 2013 Update 2RC to VS 2013 Update 2 and typescript does not seems to work:

output log:
1>CompileTypeScript:
1>  C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft SDKs\TypeScript\1.0\tsc.exe  --target ES5 --locale en-US <SCRIPT PATHS>
1>  Cannot initialize ActiveScript
Win 8.1, IE 11 works fine

The only time I've seen this in the past is when you don't have IE10 installed (https://typescript.codeplex.com/discussions/453051)

You might want to try installing the update again using 'Repair' to see if it helps. Out of curiosity, if you don't pass in the --locale, does it change?

I found that after update the "\Microsoft SDKs\TypeScript\1.0" folder does not contain "tschost.dll" file.
I repair VS and problem has gone away...
